answers.answer: Those are all symptoms of preeclampsia. Do you know have anything to test your blood pressure?
I agree, at least call the doc and see what they say
I agree I'd go doc or er...

question: So yesterday I was laying in bed and got areal bad headache. I laid in bed basically all day. I took a nap but when I woke up I was super nausiated, then I got hot, and started having super bad back pain. I took a bath and tylenol and went back to sleep. I'm 29+5 weeks. Today I woke up still in pain and still nausiated. My husband works 3 hours away and I have no one to watch our 2 year old. My husband will come home if I needed him to. I'm just uncomfortable. Any suggestions?
title: what would you do?
